dartBarrel.files.disableRecursiveBarrell: Disable the recurtion for subdirectories when creating the barrel file
dartBarrel.files.includeExtensionOnExpor: Extensions to include on the export. This is used to filter the files to export
dartBarrel.files.ignoreFilePathPatternOn: Glob patterns to ignore on the export. This is used to filter the files to export
dartBarrel.files.supportsHiddenFiles: Support hidden files and directories when exporting (files starting with a dot)
dartBarrel.files.preserveGitignoreSettin: Preserve the settings from the .gitignore file when exporting
dartBarrel.files.exportDefaultFilename: Default filename to use when exporting the files
dartBarrel.files.outputFilePrefix: Prefix to use for the output file
dartBarrel.files.outputFileSuffix: Suffix to use for the output file
dartBarrel.files.outputFileSeparator: Separator to use for the output file
dartBarrel.formatting.endOfLine: End of line character to use
dartBarrel.formatting.insertFinalNewline: Insert a final newline at the end of the file
